author: sky.cactus
content: <@552133098075193354> Is `EIP-2364: eth/64: forkid-extended protocol handshake` live in Geth?

author: sky.cactus
content: I would like to wait to merge it as final until it is live in at least one production client, just to avoid it needing to be mutated after it is final.

author: sky.cactus
content: Same question for `EIP-2464: eth/65: transaction announcements and retrievals`.  Is that live in a production client?

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm assuming that has made it to a production release at this point.  ðŸ˜„

author: potuz
content: Yeah it was in the release notes for 1.10.0 of geth, let me find the PRs

author: potuz
content: I think this is the easiest, not sure if this is all of that EIP, but scroll to the les/4 section here <https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/releases/tag/v1.10.0>
